alert.note: Alert for Foster (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 09 at 6:22AM CST until November 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations between 12 and 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Foster County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Blizzard Warning, from 3 AM Thursday to Midnight CST Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Walking surfaces could become very slippery this morning.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. Notify a friend or family member of your travel plans. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
